message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. Given its potential, I'm starting the bidding at $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer. While I recognize your perspective on the market value, this product offers unique advantages that justify a higher price point.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,130,000.

I understand your perspective on the product's unique advantages, but I'm still hesitant to go above $1,100,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose $1,115,000. Can we compromise on this price?
